output.sentences: The girls were having fun together, if a little self conscious in their tiny swimsuits.
The boys nearby were excited and rowdy today.
The adults decided to take a splash too, though full coverage they weren't as self concious!
It was a blast for the parents too.
Another group of teenage girls saw the fun and decided to join in, even if they weren't dressed for it!
